data.name: Desert
data.description: Desert planets produce lower reward shipments and provide ample space for storing hydrogen.

data.name: Fire
data.description: Fire planets produce decent rewards shipments and give your Empire a small income of credits and hydrogen per hour.

data.name: Water
data.description: Water planets produce decent reward shipments and give your Empire a steady income of credits per hour.

data.name: Terran
data.description: Terran planets produce regular reward shipments and give your Empire a small income of hydrogen per hour.

data.name: Gas
data.description: Gas planets produce regular reward shipments and give your Empire a small income of credits per hour.

data.name: Ice
data.description: Ice planets produce high reward shipments and give your Empire a steady income of Credits and Hydrogen per hour.
